title: Finally some good news in the Pune car crash case
selftext: I read article recently, and honestly it felt really positive given all the negative news I've been seeing. I've seen outrage all across social media, and maybe that was one of the reasons it caught the deputy CM's eye. I hope justice will be served.
comments:
It's us. We have stopped outrage. People in power are now not scared of indian people's outrage. 
It's a shame that the value of two lives is a 300 word essay.
Seriously, this is our country's sad state.
Apparently the head of the justice board and other members weren't consulted by the judge who granted those bail conditions. He was probably bought off by the builder
That's what. But then again how can we trust these people. Everyone will now work to make them look like they had no part in this.
